com.complexible.stardog

Class Contexts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.stardog.Contexts

  • public final class Contexts
extends Object
    Defines constants that represent special URIs for contexts (named graphs).
    Since:
    0.9
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Evren Sirin, Michael Grove

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.openrdf.model.URI ALL
      Special URI representing all contexts in Stardog, including the default (no) context graph.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI DEFAULT
      Special URI representing the default (no) context in Stardog.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI NAMED
      Special URI representing all named graphs in stardog, excluding the default graph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.openrdf.model.Resource defaultToNull(org.openrdf.model.Resource theResource)
      Takes a Resource identifying a named graph, and if it is the constant for the DEFAULT graph, it will return null, otherwise it returns the parameter as-is.
      static boolean isAll(org.openrdf.model.Resource theContext) 
      static boolean isDefaultGraph(org.openrdf.model.Resource theContext) 
      static org.openrdf.model.Resource nullToDefault(org.openrdf.model.Resource theResource)
      Takes a Resource identifying a named graph, and if it is null, returns the constant for the DEFAULT graph.

        Special URI representing the default (no) context in Stardog.

    • Method Detail

      • isDefaultGraph

        public static boolean isDefaultGraph(org.openrdf.model.Resource theContext)

      • isAll

        public static boolean isAll(org.openrdf.model.Resource theContext)

      • nullToDefault

        public static org.openrdf.model.Resource nullToDefault(org.openrdf.model.Resource theResource)
        Takes a Resource identifying a named graph, and if it is null, returns the constant for the DEFAULT graph. Otherwise, returns the parameter as-is.
        Parameters:
        theResource - the named graph
        Returns:
        the named graph, DEFAULT if the parameter is null.

      • defaultToNull

        public static org.openrdf.model.Resource defaultToNull(org.openrdf.model.Resource theResource)
        Takes a Resource identifying a named graph, and if it is the constant for the DEFAULT graph, it will return null, otherwise it returns the parameter as-is.
        Parameters:
        theResource - the named graph
        Returns:
        the named graph; null if it was the default graph
